content.prompt: Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: A linear model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 1 corresponds to the linear regression.
A linear model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 2 corresponds to the linear regression.
An exponential model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 1 corresponds to the exponential regression.
An exponential model is more appropriate for these data, and Residual Plot 2 corresponds to the exponential regression.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
